examples.text: He began a petition in behalf of the farmers.

definitions.definition: as the representative of somebody or instead of them

examples.text: On behalf of the department I would like to thank you all.
Her son collected the Nobel Peace Prize on her behalf.
They campaigned on behalf of asylum seekers.

wordOrigin: Middle English: from a mixture of the earlier phrases on his halve and bihalve him, both meaning ‘on his side’ (see by, half).
